name: pumpkin beanie
designer_name: danyel pink for oombawka design crochet
sizes_available: newborn, 0-3 months, 3-6 months, 6-12 months, toddler, child, adult
notes:
crochet a cute pumpkin hat for the halloween season! 
this easy crochet pattern includes sizes from baby to adult, making it perfect for family costumes, fall events, and cozy autumn days.

the hat is worked back and forth in rows, then seamed to create the shape. it features a classic pumpkin design with a stem and a fun curlicue vine. this quick and cozy project is perfect for gifts, craft fairs, or holiday photos.

 yarn: medium worsted weight [4]
 hook: 5.5 mm (i)
 sizes: baby, toddler, child, teen, adult
✨ skill level: easy

video tutorial: https://youtu.be/ldoec11vxxu

> this pattern is available for free on
> my website which is monetized by ads.
> if you prefer an ad-free version of
> the pattern it is available to
> purchase from my pattern shop.

this pattern was originally designed by danyel pink. it is now available exclusively at oombawka design crochet.

> this pumpkin hat is perfect for fall.
> whip one up to wear around halloween
> or thanksgiving! the pattern includes
> written instructions for all sizes,
> and comes with ideas for embellishing
> your little pumpkin hats. you will
> need an 5.5 mm (i) hook, and orange
> and green worsted weight yarn to
> complete this hat.
